content: The hypocrisy of fiat politicians living in energy-intensive states, refusing to move south and lower their carbon footprint, flying around in private jets, while falsely accusing #bitcoin mining of “wasting energy”- Pierre RochardIs not necessary to even border about such persons. Your topic is talking about the importance and the hatred for money, while the body and the link are talking about the hypocrisy of some anti-bitcoin politicians. I will recommend you go through this thread 7 Rules for Writing a Good Post Title and read some of the comments there, they will be helpful.I don't think anybody hates money because without money you can't buy anything which means you might not survive. But if you mean, why do people hate bitcoin and attack it? The government wants to always control, supervise and determine the financial lives of its citizens. They don't like bitcoin because it promotes freedom and privacy which limits their aim of totally overseeing people's finance. To achieve their aim they pretend to love the environment and claim to be protecting it. They accuse bitcoin mining of contributing to global warming, while they are the major contributors.
